apps.localizedDescription:
Finally, I made added my first app to AltStore. 

This app is a grade calculator app that you probably should never use because there are better ones out there. The only reason I added this app is to show off that I made it. Also it took me over an hour just to figure out how to compile the .ipa file so that it would work with AltStore. 

But I did it and now you can experience my first ever app I made.
apps.name: Josh's Grade Calculator
apps.subtitle: A grade calculator that I made
apps.versionDescription: -Added improvements and features namely haptic feedback and error messages.

news.caption: You can finally use Josh's Grade Calculator!!
news.title: Josh's Grade Calculator released on AltStore
